member.name: T:PHP.Library.Data.MsSqlLocalConfig

member.summary: Request timeout in seconds. Non-positive value means no timeout.

member.summary: Connect timeout in seconds. Non-positive value means no timeout.

member.summary: Limit on size of a batch. Non-positive value means no limit.

member.returns: The copy.

Whether to add "phpName" attribute to option nodes.

member.summary: Implements PHP functions provided by MSSQL extension.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Data.MsSql.Clear
member.summary: Clears thread static fields at the end of each request.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Data.MsSql.Close
member.summary: Close last connection.
member.returns: true on success, false on failure.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Data.MsSql.Close(PHP.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Closes a specified connection.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Data.MsSql.Connect
member.summary: Establishes a new connection to SQL server using default server, credentials, and flags.
member.returns: Resource representing the connection or a null reference (false in PHP) on failure.
member.remarks: Default values are taken from the configuration.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Data.MsSql.Connect(System.String)
member.summary: Establishes a new connection to SQL server using a specified server and default credentials and flags.
member.param: Server (host). A null reference means the default value.
member.returns: Resource representing the connection or a null reference (false in PHP) on failure.
member.remarks: Default values are taken from the configuration.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Data.MsSql.Connect(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Establishes a new connection to SQL server using a specified server and user and default password and flags.
member.param: Server (host). A null reference means the default value.
User name. A null reference means the default value.
member.returns: Resource representing the connection or a null reference (false in PHP) on failure.
member.remarks: Default values are taken from the configuration.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Data.MsSql.Connect(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Establishes a new connection to SQL server using a specified server, user, and password and default flags.
member.param: Server (host). A null reference means the default value.
User name. A null reference means the default value.
Password. A null reference means the default value.
member.returns: Resource representing the connection or a null reference (false in PHP) on failure.
member.remarks: Default values are taken from the configuration.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Data.MsSql.Connect(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Establishes a connection to SQL server using a specified server, user, and password and default flags.
member.param: Server (host). A null reference means the default value.
User name. A null reference means the default value.
Password. A null reference means the default value.
Whether to create a new link (ignored by Phalanger).
member.returns: Resource representing the connection or a null reference (false in PHP) on failure.
member.remarks: Default values are taken from the configuration.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Data.MsSql.PersistentConnect
member.summary: Establishes a new connection to MySQL server using default server, credentials, and flags.
member.returns: Resource representing the connection or a null reference (false in PHP) on failure.
member.remarks: Default values are taken from the configuration.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Data.MsSql.PersistentConnect(System.String)
member.summary: Establishes a new connection to SQL server using default server, credentials, and flags.
member.returns: Resource representing the connection or a null reference (false in PHP) on failure.
member.remarks: Default values are taken from the configuration.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Data.MsSql.PersistentConnect(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Establishes a new connection to SQL server using a specified server and user and default password and flags.
member.param: Server (host). A null reference means the default value.
User name. A null reference means the default value.
member.returns: Resource representing the connection or a null reference (false in PHP) on failure.
member.remarks: Default values are taken from the configuration. Creates a non-persistent connection. Persistent connections are not supported.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Data.MsSql.PersistentConnect(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Establishes a new connection to SQL server using a specified server, user, and password and default flags.
member.param: Server (host). A null reference means the default value.
User name. A null reference means the default value.
Password. A null reference means the default value.
member.returns: Resource representing the connection or a null reference (false in PHP) on failure.
member.remarks: Default values are taken from the configuration. Creates a non-persistent connection. Persistent connections are not supported.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Data.MsSql.PersistentConnect(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Establishes a connection to SQL server using a specified server, user, and password and default flags.
member.param: Server (host). A null reference means the default value.
User name. A null reference means the default value.
Password. A null reference means the default value.
Whether to create a new link (ignored by Phalanger).
member.returns: Resource representing the connection or a null reference (false in PHP) on failure.
member.remarks: Default values are taken from the configuration. Creates a non-persistent connection. Persistent connections are not supported.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Data.MsSql.FreeResult(PHP.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Releases a resource represening a query result.
member.returns: true on success, false on failure (invalid resource).

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Data.MsSql.SelectDb(System.String)
member.summary: Selects the current DB for the last created connection.
member.returns: true on success, false on failure.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Data.MsSql.SelectDb(System.String,PHP.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Selects the current DB for a specified connection.
member.returns: true on success, false on failure.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Data.MsSql.Query(System.String)
member.summary: Sends a query to the current database associated with the last created connection.
member.returns: Query resource or a null reference (null in PHP) on failure.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Data.MsSql.Query(System.String,PHP.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Sends a query to the current database associated with a specified connection.
member.returns: Query resource or a null reference (null in PHP) on failure.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Data.MsSql.Query(System.String,PHP.Core.PhpResource,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sends a query to the current database associated with a specified connection.
member.returns: Query resource or a null reference (null in PHP) on failure.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Data.MsSql.FetchRow(PHP.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Get a result row as an integer indexed array.
member.returns: Array indexed by integers starting from 0 containing values of the current row.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Data.MsSql.FetchAssoc(PHP.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Get a result row as an associative array.
member.returns: Array indexed by column names containing values of the current row.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Data.MsSql.FetchArray(PHP.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Get a result row as an associative array combined with integer-indexed array.
member.returns: Array indexed by both column names and indices containing values of the current row. Each value is contained twice - once with column name key and once with column index.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Data.MsSql.FetchArray(PHP.Core.PhpResource,PHP.Library.Data.MsSql.QueryResultKeys)
member.summary: Get a result row as an array with a specified key format.
member.param: Type(s) of keys in the resulting array.
member.returns: Array containing values of the rows indexed by column keys and/or column indices depending on value of .

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Data.MsSql.FetchObject(PHP.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Get a result row as an object.
member.returns: Object whose fields contain values from the current row. Field names corresponds to the column names.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Data.MsSql.GetLastAffectedRows
member.summary: Get a number of affected rows in the previous operation.
member.returns: The number of affected rows or -1 if the last operation failed or the connection is invalid.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Data.MsSql.GetLastAffectedRows(PHP.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Get a number of affected rows in the previous operation.
member.returns: The number of affected rows or -1 if the last operation failed or the connection is invalid.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Data.MsSql.GetFieldCount(PHP.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Get number of columns (fields) in a specified result.
member.returns: Number of columns in the specified result or 0 if the result resource is invalid.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Data.MsSql.GetRowCount(PHP.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Get number of rows in a specified result.
member.returns: Number of rows in the specified result or 0 if the result resource is invalid.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Data.MsSql.GetLastMessage
member.summary: Gets last error message.
member.returns: The message sent by server.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Data.MsSql.MinErrorSeverity(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets a threshold for displaying errors sent by server. Not supported.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Data.MsSql.MinMessageSeverity(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets a threshold for displaying messages sent by server. Not supported.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Data.MsSql.GetField(PHP.Core.PhpResource,System.Int32,System.Object)
member.summary: Gets a contents of a specified cell from a specified query result resource.
member.param: Column (field) integer index or string name.
member.returns: The value of the cell or a null reference (false in PHP) on failure (invalid resource or row index).

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Data.MsSql.NextResult(PHP.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Fetches the next result set if the query returned multiple result sets.
member.returns: Whether the next result set is available.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Data.MsSql.FieldName(PHP.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Gets a name of the current column (field) in a result.
member.returns: Name of the column or a null reference on failure (invalid resource or column index).

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Data.MsSql.FieldName(PHP.Core.PhpResource,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a name of a specified column (field) in a result.
member.returns: Name of the column or a null reference on failure (invalid resource or column index).

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Data.MsSql.FieldType(PHP.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Gets a type of the current column (field) in a result.
member.returns: MSSQL type translated to PHP terminology.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Data.MsSql.FieldType(PHP.Core.PhpResource,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a type of a specified column (field) in a result.
member.returns: MSSQL type translated to PHP terminology.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Data.MsSql.FieldLength(PHP.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Gets a length of the current column (field) in a result.
member.returns: Length of the column or a -1 on failure (invalid resource or column index).

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Data.MsSql.FieldLength(PHP.Core.PhpResource,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a length of a specified column (field) in a result.
member.returns: Length of the column or a -1 on failure (invalid resource or column index).

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Data.MsSql.FieldSeek(PHP.Core.PhpResource,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the result resource's current column (field) offset.
member.returns: true on success, false on failure (invalid resource or column offset).

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Data.MsSql.DataSeek(PHP.Core.PhpResource,System.Int32)
